name: National Nonprofit Organization Recreational Boating Safety Grant Program
objective: The mission of the National RBS Program is to ensure the public has a safe, secure, and enjoyable recreational boating experience by implementing programs designed to minimize the loss of life, personal injury, and property damage while cooperating with environmental and national security efforts via cooperative agreements to nonprofit organizations.
applicant_types: Nonprofit with 501C3 IRS Status (Other than Institution of Higher Education)
